HomePage.title: Create Professional Surveys in Minutes
HomePage.description: Build, distribute, and analyze surveys with our modern, easy-to-use platform. Get started in less than 10 minutes without any technical expertise.

Pricing.page_subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Upgrade or downgrade anytime.
Pricing.faq_change_plan_q: Can I change my plan later?
Pricing.faq_change_plan_a: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time from your billing dashboard.
Pricing.faq_payment_methods_q: What payment methods do you accept?
Pricing.faq_payment_methods_a: We accept all major credit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay through Stripe.
Pricing.faq_free_trial_a: Yes, new users get a 14-day free trial of the Pro plan. No credit card required.
Pricing.faq_exceed_limit_q: What happens if I exceed my survey limit?
Pricing.faq_exceed_limit_a: You'll be prompted to upgrade to a higher tier. Your existing surveys will remain accessible.
Pricing.faq_cancel_a: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.
Pricing.faq_refunds_a: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for annual subscriptions.

Subscription.survey_limit_banner_description: Upgrade your plan to create more surveys and unlock advanced features

Subscription.trial_offer_description: Experience all Pro features free for 14 days. No payment required to start.

Subscription.trial_expiring_soon_action: Upgrade now to continue enjoying Pro features without interruption.
Subscription.trial_conversion_expired_description: Your 14-day Pro trial has ended. Upgrade now to continue accessing Pro features.
Subscription.trial_conversion_expiring_description: Your trial ends in {days, plural, =1 {1 day} other {{days} days}}. Upgrade now to keep all your Pro features.
Subscription.trial_conversion_expired_details: You'll be downgraded to the Free plan unless you upgrade.
Subscription.trial_conversion_expiring_details: Don't lose access to your Pro features.
Subscription.trial_conversion_pricing_details: Cancel anytime. No long-term commitment required.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: Have questions about our custom plans or need help? We're here to assist you.
Contact.form_description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24 business hours.
Contact.field_message_placeholder: Tell us about your needs and how we can help...
Contact.success_message: We've received your message and will respond as soon as possible.
Contact.redirecting: Redirecting you back to pricing page...
Contact.error_generic: Failed to send your message. Please try again.
Contact.error_network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
Contact.privacy_notice: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy. We'll only use your information to respond to your inquiry.
Contact.message_sent: Your message has been sent successfully!
